body_html: @carpodaster no worries, no one has brought it up until yesterday, and I waited to answer that email until I had a clearer idea of how we would handle possible volunteers in the application process :) so it's all good. Also of course good to know that they can choose to apply as both with the checkbox. thank you for doing all this great work on the teams app!!!
